idea:
VYugma - Where Open Source Meets Innovation

A technology consulting start-up based out of Mumbai focused on delivering solutions, services, and platforms on open source and cloud technologies. Our tech expertise fused with our global and local industry insights together energize enterprises to help them address today’s urgent business challenges.

Our passion is to steer transformation in enterprises through our innovation-centered open source solutions – with the latest platform technologies, design thinking, and agility. Because technology will never stop evolving, and neither should your business.
name: VYUGMA TECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We at Unominds are on a quest to find best talent for education. We will create and deploy thousands of high-quality teaching skills /credible teachers at affordable cost and take the world class education to every corner of the country.

Unominds is about training teachers on teaching methodologies and 21st century teaching skills so that they can provide required knowledge, skills and guidance to children to reach their maximum potential.

Our teachers are trained to identify early signs of learning disabilities/developmental disabilities and help children learn using appropriate tools and methodologies

Our Teachers are trained to counsel parents and make them a partner in the development of children

Our teachers are trained in international curriculum of Finland, Britain, Canada and Singapore alongside Indian curriculum which help them better prepare themselves to deal with the development young children

Our teachers are trained to teach academics, sports, Technology, Values, Environmental literacy, financial literacy, English Language, GK and 21st century life skills in fun and creative manner.
name: UNOMINDS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: TAX PLANNING AND FINANCIAL ADVISORS, PROVIDING CONSULTATION IN THE FIELD OF TAXATION AND PERFECT FINANCIAL PLANNERS FOR ALL YOUR NEEDS
name: AIOTS TAX PLANNING AND FINANCIAL ADVISORS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Since the last 12 years, APChemi offers commercially proven technology and plants, to convert mechanically non-recyclable plastics into pyrolysis oil. APChemi has commissioned 30 plants of capacity up to 12TPD and has published 7 patents. APChemi is supported by Royal Dutch Shell as part of the Shell E4 program. APChemi is part of the Singapore start-up accelerator program of PNP - Alliance to End Plastic Waste. Our 30+ global clients include Equate, Shell, Uflex, Greenjoules and CPE. APChemi has keen interest in co-owning and operating pyrolysis plants. APChemi also offers Engineering, Equipment manufacturing, Consulting and Technology licensing solutions in the domain of plastic pyrolysis. APChemi has interest in the pyrolysis oil offtake. APChemi has Over 15 commercially operational pyrolysis plants of capacity up to 12 ton per day, located mostly in India and Africa. Research laboratory and machinery fabrication facility.
name: APCHEMI PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Ashnam Retail came into existence not just to do business but to make sure

that the trend continues to be in its best glory all throughout and to

accomplish vision of Manoj K Sharma of catering today’s global citizen having

traditional roots and international lifestyle. With religious & decorative

figurines that at once depicts our rich tradition and elegance that will add

splendid touch of glamour to merge your faith and our heritage with your

lifestyle. This vision marked the inception of Ashnam Retail Pvt Ltd in the year 2010 vision of Manoj K Sharma.

Our products are designed with the paramount craftsmanship and purity we ensures to mesmerize you by its mere presence be it at your home, car or office or given as token of love. exclusive boutique range and designs from ethnic to modern and blend of both

to serve “you” and reveal you as global citizen and dazzle your beauty.

Our products will be an add-on to your status and style statement with our

home decor  range that at once will capture your attention with

well-designed and finished products that speaks of our rich heritage and gives you a contemporary feel that will win over your heart, over & over again with every glance of yours! We offer wide range of products to customers and distributors with purity and guarantee in quality that will enrich your fervor. So, Join us and Surrender your expressions and emotion with Ashnam Artifacts.


We create “Glittering Creation beyond Imagination”!
name: Ashnam Retail Pvt Ltd
